data.scheme_name: Uttar Pradesh Startup Policy 2020 - Incentives for Startups - Prototype Grant
data.benefits: Scheme provides a one-time prototyping grant of up to Rs 5 Lakh per startup.
data.eligibility: All startup units based in Uttar Pradesh
data.conditions: All the startups have to register with the StartInUP to get eligible for various benefits offered under the policy.
data.beneficiaries: All startup units based in Uttar Pradesh
data.prerequisites: All the startups have to register with the StartInUP to get eligible for various benefits offered under the policy.
data.nodal_agency: Policy Monitoring & Implementation Committee (PMIC) under Infrastructure and Industries Development Commissioner (IIDC), Department of IT & Electronics, Govt. of Uttar Pradesh
data.context:
• Startup Policy 2020', the State Government is aiming to inculcate the culture of entrepreneurship at school level itself in order to make students learn virtues of entrepreneurship during early years of their education. 
  • This initiative will not only elevate the student learning to a new level but also help in creating entrepreneurs of the future.
data.objective:
1. To be among top 3 states in the "States’ Startup Ranking" conducted by, GoI 

2. Establish/support 100 incubators, minimum one in each district of the State 

3. Establish India’s largest incubator in Lucknow 

4. To encourage innovators to stimulate commercialization of their inventions.
data.description: A one-time prototyping grant of up to INR 5 Lakh per startup shall be provided to DPIIT and StartInUP registered startups. The assistance shall be provided in single tranche to startups.
data.how_to_apply: Startup can go and register in the provided link: https://www.startupindia.gov.in/content/sih/en/registration.html
data.funding_facilitator: Policy Monitoring & Implementation Committee (PMIC) under Infrastructure and Industries Development Commissioner (IIDC), Department of IT & Electronics, Govt. of Uttar Pradesh
data.funding_mechanism: The assistance shall be provided in single tranche to startups.
data.highlights: Number of beneficiaries and Amount of benefit disbursed: https://startinup.up.gov.in/welcome/incentive_disbursed
data.checklist_info_a:
1. Letter of Intent from partners(if any)
2. Registration Certificate of the Institution(Not Applicable in case of Individuals)
3. Plan including Budget Plan
4. Letter of Declaration
5. PAN Card
6. ID proofs such as Aadhar Card, Driving License, Proof of residence etc
5. Details and documents of the company
data.checklist_info_d:
Address: 
10, Ashok Marg, Sadullah Nagar, Narhi, Hazratganj, Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226001

Email id: NA
Contact Details: NA
data.beneficiary: All Industry - Private Limited Company, Partnership, Limited Liability Partnership (LLP) - Uttar Pradesh - All MSMEs and Non MSMEs

scheme_display_name.name: Prototype Grant - Incentives for Startups - Uttar Pradesh Startup Policy 2020
